name: AI Sandbox
description:
AI Sandbox (Name Still To Determined) is like a virtual pet battle simulator using machine learning. Where I bring in characters from anime/comics to see how well they fare against one another.

---

Controls:

WASD - Move the Camera Around

NEAT in Manager - The controls for the neural network training. Which lets you set the weights, neurons, bias and etc... After setting up the configuration you want (I just went with my instincts), click "Learn" to start the training and watch it go.
